#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long 
map<ll,ll> m;
map<ll,ll>:: iterator it;
int main()
{
    ll n,i,j,count=0;
    cin>>n;
    ll a[n];
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>a[i];
        m[a[i]]++;
    }
    n=n*(n-1)/2;
    for(it=m.begin();it!=m.end();it++)
    {
        if(it->second>1)
        count+=it->second*(it->second-1)/2;
    }
    cout<<n-count<<endl;
    return 0;
}
